policy_implications: Higher borrowing costs affecting capital investment decisions

Energy security policies favoring domestic production

initial_observations: ConocoPhillips demonstrates strong fundamental position with solid financial metrics and cash generation

Strong institutional ownership (82.81%) and analyst support (Buy rating) indicating market confidence
